meanings.definition: A type of lipoprotein that transports dietary fats from the intestines to the liver and other tissues.
meanings.sent1: Chylomicrons help move fats from the intestines to the liver.
meanings.sent2: The body uses chylomicrons to carry fats after a meal.
meanings.sent3: Imagine tiny boats called chylomicrons sailing through your body with fats!
meanings.sent4: In the bloodstream, chylomicrons act like little taxis for fats.
meanings.sent5: Picture chylomicrons as tiny delivery trucks moving fats around your body.

meanings.definition: Large particles composed of triglycerides, cholesterol, and proteins.
meanings.sent1: Triglycerides and cholesterol are found in chylomicrons.
meanings.sent2: Proteins play a role in the structure of chylomicrons.
meanings.sent3: The science class model showed how chylomicrons are made of different parts.
meanings.sent4: Under a microscope, chylomicrons look like tiny bubbles of fats and proteins.
meanings.sent5: The recipe for chylomicrons includes a mix of fats, cholesterol, and proteins.
